newsitem.title: VIETNAM: Vietnam to sell 100 bln dong T-notes on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Vietnam to sell 100 bln dong T-notes on Wednesday.

text.p: Vietnam will auction 100 billion dong ($8.57 million) worth of one-year Treasury notes later on Wednesday, an official at the State Bank of Vietnam said.
At the last sale of government paper, on June 11, the central bank sold 70 billion dong worth of one-year Treasury notes to domestic institutions at an annual interest rate of 11.79 percent.
The government has held 12 Treasury paper auctions so far this year, through which a total of 519.4 billion dong worth of Treasury stock has been issued. ($1 = 11,664 dong)
